subject: Order SSN4111
description_text:
Please, can I know if the second part of my order is being shipped? That's
unacceptable. I've been trying to contact you for a week, and you haven't
even bothered to respond. Please.

conversations.body_text: 你好，Alex Bonifacino， Your food delivery order will be shipped out gradually from the 23rd to the 26th. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
